mapper.sql: id, siteId, addTime, orderRepairId, operator, operate, remark
mapper.insert: insert into orderrepairlogs (id, siteId, addTime, orderRepairId, operator, operate, remark) values (#{id}, #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},unix_timestamp(now()) , #{orderrepairid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, from_unixtime(p.addTime) addTimeTss, p.orderRepairId, p.operator, p.operate, p.remark, s.cOrderSn FROM OrderRepairLogs p, OrderRepairs a, OrderProducts s where p.orderRepairId = a.id and a.orderProductId = s.id AND a.repairSn =#{id}
